Author: grumpert-the-man
Text: Thank you for responding. I think I'll try to talk to A at some point.

Author: SubBiscuit
Text: Expressing your hurt is okay. If they act as if what they did shouldnt have hurt you, that could be gaslighting and that's not okay.  You have a right to express your feelings and be heard in a friendship. You should shove your emotional health to the side just to "be friendly"
